mapper.sql:
SELECT
FROM rgdb."DbT7060KaigoJigyosha" WHERE rgdb."DbT7060KaigoJigyosha"."isDeleted" = FALSE

"DbT7060KaigoJigyosha"."jigyoshaNo" as "dbT7060KaigoJigyosha_jigyoshaNo", "DbT7060KaigoJigyosha"."yukoKaishiYMD" as "dbT7060KaigoJigyosha_yukoKaishiYMD", "DbT7060KaigoJigyosha"."insertDantaiCd" as "dbT7060KaigoJigyosha_insertDantaiCd", "DbT7060KaigoJigyosha"."insertTimestamp" as "dbT7060KaigoJigyosha_insertTimestamp", "DbT7060KaigoJigyosha"."insertReamsLoginId" as "dbT7060KaigoJigyosha_insertReamsLoginId", "DbT7060KaigoJigyosha"."insertContextId" as "dbT7060KaigoJigyosha_insertContextId", "DbT7060KaigoJigyosha"."isDeleted" as "dbT7060KaigoJigyosha_isDeleted", "DbT7060KaigoJigyosha"."updateCount" as "dbT7060KaigoJigyosha_updateCount", "DbT7060KaigoJigyosha"."lastUpdateTimestamp" as "dbT7060KaigoJigyosha_lastUpdateTimestamp", "DbT7060KaigoJigyosha"."lastUpdateReamsLoginId" as "dbT7060KaigoJigyosha_lastUpdateReamsLoginId", "DbT7060KaigoJigyosha"."yukoShuryoYMD" as "dbT7060KaigoJigyosha_yukoShuryoYMD", "DbT7060KaigoJigyosha"."idoYMD" as "dbT7060KaigoJigyosha_idoYMD", "DbT7060KaigoJigyosha"."idoJiyuCode" as "dbT7060KaigoJigyosha_idoJiyuCode", "DbT7060KaigoJigyosha"."jigyoKaishiYMD" as "dbT7060KaigoJigyosha_jigyoKaishiYMD", "DbT7060KaigoJigyosha"."jigyoKyushiYMD" as "dbT7060KaigoJigyosha_jigyoKyushiYMD", "DbT7060KaigoJigyosha"."jigyoSaikaiYMD" as "dbT7060KaigoJigyosha_jigyoSaikaiYMD", "DbT7060KaigoJigyosha"."jigyoHaishiYMD" as "dbT7060KaigoJigyosha_jigyoHaishiYMD", "DbT7060KaigoJigyosha"."jigyoshaName" as "dbT7060KaigoJigyosha_jigyoshaName", "DbT7060KaigoJigyosha"."jigyoshaNameKana" as "dbT7060KaigoJigyosha_jigyoshaNameKana", "DbT7060KaigoJigyosha"."yubinNo" as "dbT7060KaigoJigyosha_yubinNo", "DbT7060KaigoJigyosha"."jigyoshaAddress" as "dbT7060KaigoJigyosha_jigyoshaAddress", "DbT7060KaigoJigyosha"."jigyoshaKanaAddress" as "dbT7060KaigoJigyosha_jigyoshaKanaAddress", "DbT7060KaigoJigyosha"."telNo" as "dbT7060KaigoJigyosha_telNo", "DbT7060KaigoJigyosha"."faxNo" as "dbT7060KaigoJigyosha_faxNo", "DbT7060KaigoJigyosha"."atesakiBusho" as "dbT7060KaigoJigyosha_atesakiBusho", "DbT7060KaigoJigyosha"."atesakininName" as "dbT7060KaigoJigyosha_atesakininName", "DbT7060KaigoJigyosha"."atesakininNamekana" as "dbT7060KaigoJigyosha_atesakininNamekana", "DbT7060KaigoJigyosha"."shiteiKijungaitoJigyoshaKubun" as "dbT7060KaigoJigyosha_serviceJisshiChiiki", "DbT7060KaigoJigyosha"."hojinShubetsu" as "dbT7060KaigoJigyosha_hojinShubetsu", "DbT7060KaigoJigyosha"."bedSu" as "dbT7060KaigoJigyosha_bedSu", "dbT7060KaigoJigyosha_biko"
mapper.select: SELECT tbl."jigyoshaName" as "dbT7060KaigoJigyosha_jigyoshaName" FROM ( SELECT row_number() over() as rownum, "jigyoshaName" FROM rgdb."DbT7060KaigoJigyosha" WHERE rgdb."DbT7060KaigoJigyosha"."jigyoshaNo" = #{jigyoshaNo} AND rgdb."DbT7060KaigoJigyosha"."yukoKaishiYMD" <= #{yukoKaishiYMD} ORDER BY rgdb."DbT7060KaigoJigyosha"."yukoKaishiYMD" DESC )tbl WHERE tbl."rownum" = 1

SELECT tbl."jigyoshaName" as "dbT7060KaigoJigyosha_jigyoshaName" FROM ( SELECT row_number() over() as rownum, "jigyoshaName" FROM rgdb."DbT7060KaigoJigyosha" WHERE rgdb."DbT7060KaigoJigyosha"."jigyoshaNo" IN #{no} AND rgdb."DbT7060KaigoJigyosha"."yukoKaishiYMD" <= #{yukoKaishiYMD} AND rgdb."DbT7060KaigoJigyosha"."yukoShuryoYMD" > #{yukoKaishiYMD} )tbl WHERE tbl."rownum" = 1
